face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc
to resemble/to be like/to look as if/such as/appearance/image/portrait/image under a mapping (math.)

sentences.english: Sphinxes do not relinquish their secrets so easily.
sentences.chinese: 狮身人面像不放弃自己的秘密，那么容易。

sentences.english: The Sphinx was also dated back to 10,500 B. C.
sentences.chinese: 狮身人面像也被追溯至公元前10，500年。

sentences.english: The pyramid and sphinxes be rated as the mankind's miracle of the building history.
sentences.chinese: 金字塔和狮身人面像堪称人类建筑史上的奇迹。

sentences.english: Oedipus met Sphinx on a cliff.
sentences.chinese: 俄狄浦斯上遇到了狮身人面像悬崖。

sentences.english: At the Great Sphinx site, the inscription on a stele erected a thousand years.
sentences.chinese: 狮身人面像附近树立了一千年的石碑载有碑刻铭文。

definition: Parthenon Temple on the Acropolis, Athens
Tutankhamen, king of ancient Egypt 1333-1323 BC
Tutankhamen, king of ancient Egypt 1333-1323 BC
